judges: Before Bell, C. J., Musmanno, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien and Roberts, JJ.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
Decree affirmed, each party to pay own costs.
Mr. Justice Jones took no part in the consideration or decision of this case.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Helen M. Frank, appellant, in propria persona.
John L. Bigelow, with him Robert J. Gillespie, and Bigelow, Gillespie & LaRocca, for remaining trustee, appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Gilbert Trust.
Argued November 13, 1964.
Before Bell, C. J., Musmanno, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien and Roberts, JJ.
January 5, 1965:
Helen M. Frank, appellant, in propria persona.
John L. Bigelow, with him Robert J. Gillespie, and Bigelow, Gillespie & LaRocca, for remaining trustee, appellee.
Elwood H. Jones, for appellee.
